name: Kiran Mental Health Rehabilitation Helpline
description: Offers support for mental health issues including anxiety, depression, and suicidal thoughts.

name: Snehi
description: Provides emotional support and counseling for individuals in distress.

name: ICall by TISS
description: Offers telephonic and email-based counseling services in multiple languages.

name: Fortis Stress Helpline
description: Offers support for stress, anxiety, and other mental health issues.

name: Samaritans Mumbai
description: Provides emotional support for those feeling distressed or suicidal.

name: Lifeline Foundation
description: Offers support for mental health issues including depression and anxiety.

name: Vandrevala Foundation
description: Provides mental health support and emotional crisis intervention for all age groups.

name: Snehi Youth Helpline
description: Offers counseling and emotional support for youth and adolescents.

name: NIMHANS COVID-19 Mental Health Helpline
description: Provides support for stress, anxiety, and mental health issues related to the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Sangath
description: Offers support and counseling for LGBTQ+ individuals.

name: CHILDLINE India
description: National helpline for children in distress.

name: National Commission for Women (NCW)
description: Provides support for women facing mental health issues, domestic violence, and distress.

name: Parivarthan
description: Offers telephonic counseling for emotional and mental health issues.

name: Sumaitri
timing: 2 PM to 10 PM, all days except Monday
description: Provides support for those feeling suicidal or in emotional distress.
